title: DeepNAP
authors: Jingchu Liu, Bhaskar Krishnamachari, Sheng Zhou, Zhisheng Niu

parameters.name: partial_sequence_length
parameters.description: Number of points taken from the beginning of the predicted window used to build a partial sequence (with neighboring points) that is passed through another linear network.

parameters.name: lstm_layers
parameters.description: Number of LSTM layers within encoder and decoder

parameters.name: rnn_hidden_size
parameters.description: Number of neurons in LSTM hidden layer

parameters.name: dropout
parameters.description: Probability for a neuron to be zeroed for regularization

parameters.name: linear_hidden_size
parameters.description: Number of neurons in linear hidden layer

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: Number of instances trained at the same time

parameters.name: validation_batch_size
parameters.description: Number of instances used for validation at the same time

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.description: Number of training iterations over entire dataset; recommended value: 256

parameters.name: early_stopping_delta
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: early_stopping_patience
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator
